title: Google\Cloud\SecurityCenter\V1\ExternalSystem
name: ExternalSystem
description:
Representation of third party SIEM/SOAR fields within SCC.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.securitycenter.v1.ExternalSystem

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: External System Name e.g. jira, demisto, etc. e.g.: organizations/1234/sources/5678/findings/123456/externalSystems/jira folders/1234/sources/5678/findings/123456/externalSystems/jira projects/1234/sources/5678/findings/123456/externalSystems/jira

params.name: data.assignees
params.description: References primary/secondary etc assignees in the external system.

params.name: data.external_uid
params.description: Identifier that's used to track the given finding in the external system.

params.name: data.status
params.description: Most recent status of the corresponding finding's ticket/tracker in the external system.

params.name: data.external_system_update_time
params.description: The most recent time when the corresponding finding's ticket/tracker was updated in the external system.
